description:
4.5+ Rating, TechCrunch, Mashable, NYTimes and others are raving about Runtastic... Find out why & download Runtastic Road Bike today!

Track your bicycle rides, races & training workouts with your iPhone turned cycling computer and trainer! The Runtastic Road Bike app is your ideal biking companion with over 50 incredible features and user benefits! 

TOP APP FEATURES AND BENEFITS (limited in LITE version):

- GPS Tracking & History: Cycling performance data – time, distance, speed, elevation, calories
- LIVE Tracking: Track your velo route in real time to share ride with best friends
- Voice Coach: Announces workout stats & motivational messages, available in numerous languages
- Route Search: Ride thousands of bicycle routes, search available in-app & on Runtastic.com
- Music: Create a music playlist for your tour & activate your best Power Song for extra motivation
- Dashboard Configuration: Displays all preferred biking statistics
- Mapping (Google maps): Detailed live map feature and historic mapping
- Open Street Map Integration & Offline Maps Available: Download int’l maps for overseas biking, like the Tour de France
- Colored Traces: Track biking pace, speed, grade, elevation & heart rate
- Current rate of climb, followed by detailed post-tour data on time rode uphill, downhill, flat
- Automatic pause detection during your ride or interval training
- Weather & wind data
- Cadence measurement with the Runtastic Speed & Cadence Sensor
- Heart rate measurement (with additional hardware)
- Users are encouraged to save all workout, interval & race activities on Runtastic.com
- Share your bicycle activities & accomplishments on Facebook, Google+, Twitter & via E-mail
*** Features & benefits limited in lite version

COMPATIBLE CYCLE HARDWARE:

- Runtastic Speed & Cadence Sensor (Bluetooth Low Energy)
- Runtastic Bike Case for iPhone + accessories
- Runtastic Sports Armband + accessories
- Various Runtastic heart rate monitors

This highly-rated app is 100% velo focused to give the rider the ultimate performance measurement tool for every ride - from an afternoon in the park with the kids to a stage of the Tour De France! You can now enjoy and analyze your rides in a completely new way.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
trackCensoredName: Runtastic Road Bike GPS Cycling Computer, Ride and Route Tracker
trackName: Runtastic Road Bike GPS Cycling Computer, Ride and Route Tracker
releaseNotes:
- Optimized for the latest iOS

Enjoy the latest version of our app! We look forward to your helpful reviews in the App Store!
